sources.title: West of Zanzibar (1928) LON CHANEYüçï LIONEL BARRYMORE
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Lon Chaney, Lionel Barrymore, Mary Nolan, Warner Baxter
Director: Tod Browning
üçïPresented with the original synchronized orchestral score and sound effectsüçï
In this slimy love triangle, Lon Chaney is at his grotesque best as a cuckold magician hellbent on punishing the Congo ivory trader he believes ruined his life. 

TRIVIA: This is the 7th of eight films TOD BROWNING directed LON CHANEY for M-G-M between 1925 and ‚Äò29.

metadata.Plot: Magician Phroso's wife Anna leaves him for another man, named Crane, who fights with Phroso and leaves him paralyzed. Later Anna returns and he finds her dead, leaving behind a daughter. For 18 years Phroso, known as "Dead Legs" by his cronies, plots his revenge, becoming a pseudo-king in East Africa, nearby where Crane has set up an ivory business. When the daughter is grown, having lived in a brothel in Zanzibar thanks to "Dead Legs", Phroso put his plan into action, resulting in revenge and retribution all around.
metadata.Writer: Elliott J. Clawson, Chester M. De Vonde, Joseph Farnham
metadata.Actors: Lon Chaney, Lionel Barrymore, Mary Nolan
